question: Dr B A Sanadi passed away in March 2019 in Kumta, Karnataka. Who was he?
explanation: Babasaheb Ahmed Sahab Sanadi was a Kannada poet. He was a winner of the coveted Pampa award and Rajyotsava award. He was among the few writers who worked as an organic link between the literary worlds of Kannada and Urdu. He wrote books in Kannada, translated books from Marathi and Urdu to Kannada. He was awarded an Honoris casa by the Karnataka University, Dharwad. He won several awards including the Karnataka Sahitya Academy award.
